block.p: After a hyperbolic night when so many fidgety people did their cork popping at home, New York stepped into the new year a little sleepier, a little messier, but otherwise mostly normal. PAGE 31
ACROSS AMERICA -- A look at celebrations in five time zones, from Lubec, Me., where bagpipes greeted the dawn, to Honolulu, where fireworks were the order of the day.PAGE 14
After a hyperbolic night when so many fidgety people did their cork popping at home, New York stepped into the new year a little sleepier, a little messier, but otherwise mostly normal. PAGE 31
ACROSS AMERICA -- A look at celebrations in five time zones, from Lubec, Me., where bagpipes greeted the dawn, to Honolulu, where fireworks were the order of the day.PAGE 14
ON THE INTERNET -- Even the Internet's most dedicated harbingers of millennium doom had to concede that things had turned out better than they had expected.PAGE 13
CUBA ABSTAINED -- Havana said it would celebrate next year under the Christian calendar, but its New Year had the feel of being on the cusp of a new era.PAGE 12
